bibl.title: Aramaic, Hebrew and Greek Documentary Texts from Nahal Hever and Other Sites, with an Appendix Containing Alleged Qumran Texts (The Seiyâl Collection II). (Discoveries in the Judaean Desert. XXVII.)
bibl.note: Pp. 131-279: Greek Documentary Texts by H.M. COTTON. (Introduction to the Greek Documentary Texts; - Palaeographical Notes by J. David THOMAS; - Introduction to the Archive of Salome Komaïse Daughter of Levi, 125-131 CE; - Texts: P. XHev/Se 60-73). - Pp. 360-375: Indices to the Greek Documentary Texts; - 376-381: Subject Index to the Greek Documentary Texts.
